General.Name: Daily Polymer
General.Description: Daily Polymer Corp. manufactures and sells synthetic resins in Taiwan. It offers polymer materials, including solvent and water based resins for paints, unsaturated polyester resins, and paint additives. The company also provides photo-electronic materials, such as liquid crystals and alignment materials; and conductive polymers. It also exports its products to Southeast and Middle Asia, India, Japan, Africa, and Hong Kong. Daily Polymer Corp. was founded in 1970 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
